verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

זֹ֚את <WH2063> likewise חֻקַּ֣ת <WH2708> This [is] the ordinance הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> of the law אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying דַּבֵּ֣ר ׀ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיִקְח֣וּ <WH3947> that they bring אֵלֶיךָ֩ <WH413> about פָרָ֨ה <WH6510> heifer אֲדֻמָּ֜ה <WH122> thee a red תְּמִימָ֗ה <WH8549> without spot אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אֵֽין־ <WH369> is no בָּהּ֙ מ֔וּם <WH3971> wherein [is] no blemish אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> [and] upon which never עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> came עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and עֹֽל׃ <WH5923> yoke

וּנְתַתֶּ֣ם <WH5414> And ye shall give אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> her unto Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest וְהוֹצִ֤יא <WH3318> that he may bring her forth אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> the camp וְשָׁחַ֥ט <WH7819> and [one] shall slay אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> her before

וְלָקַ֞ח <WH3947> shall take אֶלְעָזָ֧ר <WH499> And Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> the priest מִדָּמָ֖הּ <WH1818> of her blood בְּאֶצְבָּע֑וֹ <WH676> with his finger וְהִזָּ֞ה <WH5137> and sprinkle אֶל־ <WH413> toward נֹ֨כַח <WH5227> directly פְּנֵ֧י <WH6440> before אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <WH4150> of the congregation מִדָּמָ֖הּ <WH1818> of her blood שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven פְּעָמִֽים׃ <WH6471> times

וְשָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> And [one] shall burn אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּרָ֖ה <WH6510> the heifer לְעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in his sight אֶת־ <WH853> עֹרָ֤הּ <WH5785> her skin וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂרָהּ֙ <WH1320> and her flesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> דָּמָ֔הּ <WH1818> and her blood עַל־ <WH5921> with פִּרְשָׁ֖הּ <WH6569> with her dung יִשְׂרֹֽף׃ <WH8313> shall he burn

וְלָקַ֣ח <WH3947> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> And the priest עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> wood אֶ֛רֶז <WH730> cedar וְאֵז֖וֹב <WH231> and hyssop וּשְׁנִ֣י <WH8144> and scarlet תוֹלָ֑עַת <WH8438> oppressor וְהִשְׁלִ֕יךְ <WH7993> and cast אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> [it] into the midst שְׂרֵפַ֥ת <WH8316> of the burning הַפָּרָֽה׃ <WH6510> of the heifer

וְכִבֶּ֨ס <WH3526> shall wash בְּגָדָ֜יו <WH899> his clothes הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> Then the priest וְרָחַ֤ץ <WH7364> and he shall bathe בְּשָׂרוֹ֙ <WH1320> his flesh בַּמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> in water וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> and afterward יָב֣וֹא <WH935> he shall come אֶל־ <WH413> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> into the camp וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> shall be unclean הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> and the priest עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְהַשֹּׂרֵ֣ף <WH8313> And he that burneth אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> יְכַבֵּ֤ס <WH3526> her shall wash בְּגָדָיו֙ <WH899> his clothes בַּמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> in water וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <WH1320> his flesh בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> in water וְטָמֵ֖א <WH2930> and shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְאָסַ֣ף ׀ <WH622> shall gather אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And a man טָה֗וֹר <WH2889> [that is] clean אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֵ֣פֶר <WH665> up the ashes הַפָּרָ֔ה <WH6510> of the heifer וְהִנִּ֛יחַ <WH3240> and lay [them] up מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> the camp בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> in a clean וְ֠הָיְתָה <WH1961> become לַעֲדַ֨ת <WH5712> for the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> of Israel לְמִשְׁמֶ֛רֶת <WH4931> and it shall be kept לְמֵ֥י <WH4325> for a water נִדָּ֖ה <WH5079> of separation חַטָּ֥את <WH2403> it [is] a purification for sin הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וְ֠כִבֶּס <WH3526> shall wash הָאֹסֵ֨ף <WH622> And he that gathereth אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֤פֶר <WH665> the ashes הַפָּרָה֙ <WH6510> of the heifer אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֔יו <WH899> his clothes וְטָמֵ֖א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> until the even וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <WH1961> become לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and it shall be unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> and unto the stranger הַגָּ֥ר <WH1481> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֖ם <WH8432> among לְחֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> them for a statute עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> He that toucheth בְּמֵ֖ת <WH4191> the dead לְכָל־ <WH3605> of any נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> body אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of any man וְטָמֵ֖א <WH2930> shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

ה֣וּא <WH1931> one יִתְחַטָּא־ <WH2398> He shall purify ב֞וֹ בַּיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֛י <WH7992> himself with it on the third וּבַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> and on the seventh יִטְהָ֑ר <WH2891> he shall be clean וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֨א <WH3808> from יִתְחַטָּ֜א <WH2398> but if he purify בַּיּ֧וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֛י <WH7992> not himself the third וּבַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> then the seventh לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִטְהָֽר׃ <WH2891> he shall not be clean

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> Anyone הַנֹּגֵ֡עַ <WH5060> Whosoever toucheth בְּמֵ֣ת <WH4191> the dead בְּנֶפֶשׁ֩ <WH5315> body הָאָדָ֨ם <WH120> of any man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָמ֜וּת <WH4191> that is dead וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יִתְחַטָּ֗א <WH2398> and purifieth אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁכַּ֤ן <WH4908> the tabernacle יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God טִמֵּ֔א <WH2930> not himself defileth וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> and that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> from Israel כִּי֩ <WH3588> Because מֵ֨י <WH4325> because the water נִדָּ֜ה <WH5079> of separation לֹא־ <WH3808> was not זֹרַ֤ק <WH2236> was not sprinkled עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> on טָמֵ֣א <WH2931> upon him he shall be unclean יִהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become ע֖וֹד <WH5750> is still טֻמְאָת֥וֹ <WH2932> his uncleanness בֽוֹ׃

זֹ֚את <WH2063> likewise הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> This [is] the law אָדָ֖ם <WH120> when a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יָמ֣וּת <WH4191> dieth בְּאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> in a tent כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone הַבָּ֤א <WH935> all that come אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <WH168> into the tent וְכָל־ <WH3605> and everyone אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בָּאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> and all that [is] in the tent יִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> Every כְּלִ֣י <WH3627> vessel פָת֔וּחַ <WH6605> And every open אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אֵין־ <WH369> has צָמִ֥יד <WH6781> which hath no covering פָּתִ֖יל <WH6616> bound עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> on טָמֵ֖א <WH2931> upon it [is] unclean הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> anyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִגַּ֜ע <WH5060> And whosoever toucheth עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> in the open הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> fields בַּֽחֲלַל־ <WH2491> one that is slain חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> with a sword א֣וֹ <WH176> or בְמֵ֔ת <WH4191> or a dead body אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or בְעֶ֥צֶם <WH6106> or a bone אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of a man א֣וֹ <WH176> or בְקָ֑בֶר <WH6913> or a grave יִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> [person] they shall take לַטָּמֵ֔א <WH2931> And for an unclean מֵעֲפַ֖ר <WH6083> of the ashes שְׂרֵפַ֣ת <WH8316> of the burnt heifer הַֽחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> of purification for sin וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> shall be put עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and מַ֥יִם <WH4325> water חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> and running אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּֽלִי׃ <WH3627> thereto in a vessel

וְלָקַ֨ח <WH3947> shall take אֵז֜וֹב <WH231> hyssop וְטָבַ֣ל <WH2881> and dip בַּמַּיִם֮ <WH4325> [it] in the water אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> person טָהוֹר֒ <WH2889> And a clean וְהִזָּ֤ה <WH5137> and sprinkle עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <WH168> [it] upon the tent וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> and upon all the vessels וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on הַנְּפָשׁ֖וֹת <WH5315> and upon the persons אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָֽיוּ־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> were there וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַנֹּגֵ֗עַ <WH5060> that were there and upon him that touched בַּעֶ֙צֶם֙ <WH6106> a bone א֣וֹ <WH176> or בֶֽחָלָ֔ל <WH2491> or one slain א֥וֹ <WH176> or בַמֵּ֖ת <WH4191> or one dead א֥וֹ <WH176> or בַקָּֽבֶר׃ <WH6913> or a grave

וְהִזָּ֤ה <WH5137> [person] shall sprinkle הַטָּהֹר֙ <WH2889> And the clean עַל־ <WH5921> on הַטָּמֵ֔א <WH2931> upon the unclean בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖י <WH7992> on the third וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֑י <WH7637> and on the seventh וְחִטְּאוֹ֙ <WH2398> he shall purify בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> and on the seventh וְכִבֶּ֧ס <WH3526> himself and wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> himself in water וְטָהֵ֥ר <WH2891> and shall be clean בָּעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> at even

וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> But the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִטְמָא֙ <WH2930> that shall be unclean וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יִתְחַטָּ֔א <WH2398> and shall not purify וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> himself that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> from among הַקָּהָ֑ל <WH6951> the congregation כִּי֩ <WH3588> because אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְדַּ֨שׁ <WH4720> the sanctuary יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD טִמֵּ֗א <WH2930> because he hath defiled מֵ֥י <WH4325> the water נִדָּ֛ה <WH5079> of separation לֹא־ <WH3808> has not זֹרַ֥ק <WH2236> hath not been sprinkled עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> on טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> upon him he [is] unclean הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become לָּהֶ֖ם לְחֻקַּ֣ת <WH2708> statute עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> And it shall be a perpetual וּמַזֵּ֤ה <WH5137> unto them that he that sprinkleth מֵֽי־ <WH4325> the water הַנִּדָּה֙ <WH5079> of separation יְכַבֵּ֣ס <WH3526> shall wash בְּגָדָ֔יו <WH899> his clothes וְהַנֹּגֵ֙עַ֙ <WH5060> and he that toucheth בְּמֵ֣י <WH4325> the water הַנִּדָּ֔ה <WH5079> of separation יִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until even

וְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יִגַּע־ <WH5060> [person] toucheth בּ֥וֹ הַטָּמֵ֖א <WH2931> And whatsoever the unclean יִטְמָ֑א <WH2930> shall be unclean וְהַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> and the soul הַנֹּגַ֖עַת <WH5060> that toucheth תִּטְמָ֥א <WH2930> [it] shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until even פ
